ddr_positive.description: Patients with DDR gene mutations (BRCA1/2, ATM, ATR, etc.)

cox.interpretation: HR < 1 = DDR_bin HIGH has LOWER death risk (same direction as ovarian)

interpretation: TREND-LEVEL SIGNAL (p=0.07-0.10). Direction is correct (HR < 1 = DDR_bin HIGH = better survival). Effect size is large (HR=0.35). However, not statistically significant at p<0.05, likely due to underpowered sample (n=81 DDR-positive).
manuscript_claim: In TCGA breast cancer, DDR_bin showed a trend toward improved survival in DDR-mutant patients (HR=0.35, p=0.10). While not reaching statistical significance, the direction of effect was consistent with ovarian cancer findings, supporting pathway-level generalizability.
